pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download, Wrangle, and Analyse Vessel Monitoring System Data // Allows to download, clean and analyse raw Vessel Monitoring System, VMS, data from Mexican government. You can use the vms_download() function to download raw data, or you can use the sample_dataset provided within the package. You can follow the tutorial in the vignette available at https://cbmc- gcmp.github.io/dafishr/index.html.
